description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              •	Work in dynamic and forward thinking teams in software development projects.
              
              •	Join projects with diversified business domains: Banking, Logistics, Manufacture, E-commerce, Finance, Business Intelligence, Healthcare, etc.
              
              •	Design, code, debug, test components or modules.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              •	Graduate University/College major IT.
              
              •	1+ years of experience in web development technologies & have in-depth knowledge of core Java and Java EE applications.
              
              •	Experience with Spring Framework, Application server such as Apache Tomcat, jboss, GIT ,…
              
              •	Knowledge of web development with HTML/CSS/JavaScript.
              
              •	Experience in building SOAP, RESTful.
              
              •	Proficiency at least one database management system such as Oracle, PostgreSQL.
              
              •	Have experience in .NET, Mobile development is preferable.
              
              •	Able to communicate in English is preferred.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                Attractive salary and bonus.
               







                Premium Health Care plan for you and your beloved family members.
               







                Team building activities and sports clubs.
